Reference

Example Datasets

ryegrass

ryegrass dataset from drc package

datNCI60

Example raw data for calculating GI50, TGI and LC50

UMSCC22B

The drug combination data of squamous cell carcinoma cells (UMSCC22B) surviving after 72 hours of treatment by single and combination dose levels of SCH66336 and 4-HPR. This is a fixed-ratio design.

nl22B2

The drug combination data between SCH66336 and 4-HPR. This is an all-possible combination design.

Quality Control (QC)

NewmanTables

Table III and IV published by Newman

NewmanTest()

Identifying outliers with the range to standard deviation ratio statistic.

drOutlier()

Identifying outliers for dose-response data

plotCCC()

Calculates Concordance Correlation Coefficient (CCC) to access reproducibility

Model Fit

recommendedModels()

Frequently used models in drexplorer2

prepDRdat()

prepare dose-reponse data

prepDRdat2expInfo()

From prepared data to experiment setup information

detect_ray_design()

Detect if a experiment is fixed-ray design and prepare input for CI computation

drFit-class

Class "drFit"

drFit()

This is a wrapper to fit dose response models from drc and DoseFinding packages.

drModels()

Show available dose-response models with direct support.

drOutlier()

Identifying outliers for dose-response data

drexplorer-package

Dose-response Explorer

drexplorerGUI_1()

Launch Graphical User Interface (GUI) for dose response curve fitting

drexplorerGUI_2()

Launch Graphical User Interface (GUI) for drug interaction (IAI) analysis

fitHSA_ray()

Fit HSA and Bliss model given a fixed ratio design with input (d1, d2, e)

fitHSA_ray_boot()

bootstrap of fitHSA_ray to obtain variation of deltaAUC

fitIAI()

Estimate the interaction index as well as its confidence interval using delta method for fixed ratio design

fitIAI_mod()

Re-implemented IAI calculation with model selection and CI

fitIAI_mod0()

Re-implemented IAI calculation with model selection and CI

fitOneExp()

Fit multiple dose response models for a single drug in a single cell line (One experiement unit)

fit_median_efect()

Fit median-effect model for 2-drug combination with a fixed ratio desgin

fHill()

The Hill equation function

hillFit()

Fit Hill equation on dose response data

nci60Fit()

Implementation of NCI60 method (GI50, TGI, LC50) for dose response data

computeAUC()

Calculate AUC from a fitted object

computeIC()

This function uses rootfinding with fitted curve to compute IC values.

computeICvariance()

compute variance of IC value at each inhibition percentage (original dose scale)

CI.delta()

Estimate the interaction index as well as its confidence interval using delta method for fixed ratio design

parse_alpha()

common code in fgui

getNormP()

calculate P value assuming avg ~ Normal(mean, sd)

getNormPvec()

calculate P value assuming avg ~ Normal(mean, sd)

toget()

General getter function for attributes in an object

predict()

predict method for drFit object

predict(<hillFit>) predict(<nci60Fit>)

predict method for hillFit class

d12_to_dproj()

convert d12 = d1+d2 to projected dose sqrt(d1^2+d2^2) in the direction of (d1, d2) given fixed ratio d2/d1

d1_to_dproj()

convert d1 to projected dose sqrt(d1^2+d2^2) given fixed ratio d2/d1

d2_to_dproj()

convert d2 to projected dose sqrt(d1^2+d2^2) given fixed ratio d2/d1

dproj_to_d1()

convert projected dose sqrt(d1^2+d2^2) to d1 given fixed ratio d2/d1

dproj_to_d2()

convert projected dose sqrt(d1^2+d2^2) to d2 given fixed ratio d2/d1

Plot Fit Objects

plot()

plot method for drFit object

plot(<hillFit>) plot(<nci60Fit>)

plot method for hillFit class

plotCCC()

Calculates Concordance Correlation Coefficient (CCC) to access reproducibility

plotHSA_ray()

plot the ray design from fit object returned by fitHSA_ray

plotIAI()

Visualize interaction index

plotIAI_mod()

Plot for the fitted object from model selection

plotOneExp()

plot dose response curve from fitOneExp() result

plot_median_effect()

Generate plot for the fit from median-effect model

lines()

lines method for drFit object

lines(<hillFit>) lines(<nci60Fit>)

lines method for hillFit class
